name: Kin Insurance, Inc.
description: Operator of an online insurance platform designed to provide simple, personalized, and affordable home insurance. The company's platform leverages thousands of property data points to customize coverage and prices through a super simple user experience while making the application process as simple as possible and recommends the right coverage for each home, enabling homeowners to get a customizable policy that is suited for them and is easy to understand and afford.
